    Enum UpdateTypes

    Update type should be used whenever there are changes to a given order and the merchant wants them reflected into the Kount system.
    Author: Kount custserv@kount.com;
    Version: 7.0.0.
    Copyright: 2017 Kount Inc

    Namespace:Kount.Enums
    Assembly:KountRisSdk.dll
    Syntax
    public enum UpdateTypes : int

    Fields

    Name Description
    ModeU

    Default update mode, only sends the update event
    ModeX

    Sends the update event and RIS service returns a status response
